mapper.insert: insert into project (pj_num, pj_name, pj_type, pj_startdate, pj_enddate, pj_manager, pl_num) values (pj_num_seq.nextval, #{pj_name}, #{pj_type}, TO_DATE(#{pj_startdate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), TO_DATE(#{pj_enddate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), #{pj_manager}, pj_num_seq.nextval)
mapper.select: select * from employee order by d_num
select * from department order by d_num
select pj_num from ( select * from project where pj_num = pl_num and pj_manager = #{pj_manager} order by pj_num desc) where rownum = 1
mapper.update: update projectlist set pl_num = #{pj_num} where pl_num = #{pj_manager}
